column3: aber a wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Sanballat na Tobia
column5: na hɛn atamfo nkaa no dɛ matow fasu no
column6: na otokur bi nnkae wɔ mu bio no; (naaso aber no mu na minnsisii mbobow no wɔ nkuropon no ano:)"

column2: "nna Sanballat na Gesem somae ma wɔbaa me nkyɛn
column5: ma yenhyia mu wɔ nkuroba no mu kor mu wɔ Ono tɛtɛr no mu. Na hɔn dze

column2: "Na mosomaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr hɔn nkyɛn
column5: dɛm ntsi murunntum minnsian mmba: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na edwuma no ntwa sin mber a mirigya no hɔ
column6: na mesian aba hom nkyɛn no?"

column2: "Na wɔsomae ma wɔbaa me nkyɛn dɛmara mpɛn anan; na mubuaa hɔn dɛmara."
"Nna Sanballat somaa n’akowaa ma ɔbaa me nkyɛn dɛmara otsia enum
column3: ɔdze nwoma a n’ano da hɔ kitsa ne nsamu;"

column5: ɔwo na Judafo no wɔrodwen dɛ wɔbɛtsew etua; ɔno ntsi na erotow fasu no yi: na ɔwoara so epɛ dɛ ibedzi hɔn do hen

column2: "Na ɔwoara so ahyehyɛ nkɔnhyɛfo so dɛ wɔnka wo ho asɛm wɔ Jerusalɛm
column4: Ɔhen bi wɔ Juda: na afei wɔbɛka akyerɛ ɔhen dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm yi tse. Dɛm ntsi afei bra
column5: na ma yɛmbɔ mu ntu egyina."

column4: Wɔnnyɛɛ ndzɛmba biara dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo ereka yi
column5: mbom wankasa na abɔ wo tsirmu irususu iyi."

column2: "Na hɔn nyinara pɛɛ dɛ wɔyɛ ma hɛn akoma tu
column4: Hɛn nsamu bɔgow efi edwuma no ho
Mehetabel ba no a wɔdze no ato dan mu no ne fie; na ɔsee me dɛ
column5: Ma yenhyia mu wɔ Nyankopɔn fie
column6: wɔ asɔrdan no mu na ma yɛntotow asɔrdan no no mbobow mu: osiandɛ wɔbɛba dɛ woruboku wo: nyew

column3: Aso ɔbarimba a ɔtse dɛ emi boguan? Na woana na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔtse dɛ emi a ɔbɛkɛhɛn asɔrdan mu dze agye noho nkwa? Moronnkɔ mu."

column4: minyaa nhumu dɛ nnyɛ Nyankopɔn bi na ɔsomaa no: na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm yi dze tsiaa me
column5: na Tobia na Sanballat na wɔabɔ no paa."

column2: "Na siantsir a wɔbɔɔ no paa nye dɛ
column6: ama woeenya kwan abɔ me dzin bɔn na wɔdze aasopa me."

column3: kaa Tobia na Sanballat dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma yi tse
column5: na nkɔnhyɛfo nkaa no a nkyɛ wɔrepɛ eyi me hu no."

column2: "Nna wowiee fasu no wɔ bosoom Elul  mu da a otsia eduonu enum no. Adaduonum ebien na wɔdze yɛe."
column3: "#6.15ELUL: Ɔtse dɛ bosoom Dzifuu ewiei kesi Fankwa bosoom no ewiei."
aber a hɛn atamfo nyinara tsee no
column4: nna amanamamfo a wɔwowɔ hɛn ho no surosuroi
column5: na wɔbombɔmee wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn enyiwa do dodoodow: na wohun dɛ edwuma yi hɛn Nyankopɔn na ɔyɛe."

column2: "Nkyii so nda no mu no Juda ekunyin no somae ma wɔdze nwoma pii kɛmaa Tobia
column3: na Tobia so no nwoma baa hɔn nkyɛn."

column2: "Na dodowara wɔ Juda a woesua akyerɛ no
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ Ara ba Sekania n’asew; na ne ba Jehohanan afa Berekia ba Mesullam ne babaa awar no."

column2: "Eso wɔbɛkaa ne ndzeyɛɛ pa ho asɛm wɔ m’enyim
column3: na wɔkɛkaa me nsɛm so kyerɛɛ no. Na Tobia kɔr do dze nwoma somae dɛ ɔdze ribeyi me hu."
